title: Practice-Based Pedagogical Design Course for Prospective Computer Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational computer science theory and proficiency in programming languages
context.additional_context: Emphasis on designing and implementing simulated lessons for real-world problem-solving

learning_goals: Acquisition of systematic computer science content design capabilities in real classroom settings
Enhancement of instructional strategy improvement skills through post-lesson reflection
Refinement of educational material development and evaluation techniques through collaboration with peer teachers
Establishment of an effective knowledge delivery system integrating theory and practice

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
